data.text: @RachelBitecofer I'm disappointed that Joe didn't point to the Russian oil stranglehold and declare work-from-home patriotic. Fuel economy is patriotic,  EVs are patriotic. Green energy is patriotic.
@RachelBitecofer He did, but I feel like no one wants to believe him. Mainstream media has a default bias to believing GOP at face value, and being skeptical of Dem claims.
@RachelBitecofer Thank you for the shout out to my man John Maynard Keynes!
@MauriMcnaughton Biden Bucks. I like it.  Thanks
@RachelBitecofer Biden Bucks; Democrats Delivered {for every voter}.

@Dont_Lie2_Me @JillayneMC @RachelBitecofer The fundamental issue is divergence between upper middle class and working class. Most of the gains are by the "haves;" most of the costs from inflation(rent/healthcare/food/gas) and supply chain shortages and overwork etc are borne by the "have nots" Trend has been reinforcing
@JillayneMC @RachelBitecofer The old: "If you want something done right, ya gotta do it yourself" sort of thing!

@JillayneMC @RachelBitecofer Sentiment is a lagging variable, the trauma was large and not evenly distributed, I still have hope our economic strength will become apparent before mids, add in a transition to endemic and moods should improve 

https://t.co/0Kqo86NXz9
